member.summary: Source Number

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.MoveRight
member.summary: Property to move the source image in the right direction by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.
If the property is true for 0.5 seconds, then the image will continue to move in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.MoveLeft
member.summary: Property to move the source image in the left direction by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.
If the property is true for 0.5 seconds, then the image will continue to move in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.MoveUp
member.summary: Property to move the source image in the up direction by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.
If the property is true for 0.5 seconds, then the image will continue to move in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.MoveDown
member.summary: Property to move the source image in the down direction by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.
If the property is true for 0.5 seconds, then the image will continue to move in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.StretchHorizontal
member.summary: Property to stretch the source image horizontally by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the image will continue to stretch in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.ShrinkHorizontal
member.summary: Property to shrink the source image horizontally by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the image will continue to shrink in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.StretchVertical
member.summary: Property to stretch the source image vertically by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the image will continue to stretch in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.ShrinkVertical
member.summary: Property to shrink the source image vertically by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the image will continue to shrink in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.SyncCoarseMore
member.summary: Property to increase the coarse sync adjustment by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to analog RGB video sources.

If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the coarse sync adjustment will continue to increase in one-step increments every 25ms until the property becomes false or until it reaches the maximum value.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.SyncCoarseLess
member.summary: Property to decrease the coarse sync adjustment by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to analog RGB video sources.

If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the coarse sync adjustment will continue to decrease in one-step increments every 25ms until the property becomes false or until it reaches the minimum value.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.GainRedUp
member.summary: Property to increase the gain of the red chrominance channel by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to analog RGB video sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the gain will continue to increase in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false, or until it reaches the maximum value.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.GainRedDown
member.summary: Property to decrease the gain of the red chrominance channel by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to analog RGB video sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the gain will continue to decrease in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false, or until the minimum value is reached.

member.remarks: This property applies only to analog RGB video sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the gain will continue to increase in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false, or until it reaches the maximum value.

member.summary: Property to decrease the fine sync adjustment by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to analog RGB video sources.

If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the fine sync adjustment will continue to decrease in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until it reaches the minimum value.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.SaturationUp
member.summary: Property to adjust the saturation of the video source input image up by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to video (non-RGB) sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the saturation will continue to adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.SaturationDown
member.summary: Property to adjust the saturation of the video source input image down by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to video (non-RGB) sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the saturation will continue to adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.HueUp
member.summary: Property to adjust the hue of the video source input image up by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to video (non-RGB) sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the hue will continue to adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.HueDown
member.summary: Property to adjust the hue of the video source input image down by one step.
member.remarks: This property applies only to video (non-RGB) sources.
If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the hue will continue to adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.InputCalibrationAuto
member.summary: Property to turn on auto-calibration mode. This property value is interlocked with the property value.
member.remarks: This property applies only to RGB (analog and digital) video sources.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.InputCalibrationManual
member.summary: Property to turn off auto-calibration mode. This property value is interlocked with the property value.
member.remarks: This property applies only to analog RGB video sources.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.DetailEnhancementUp
member.summary: Property to adjust the amount of detail enhancement to apply to the video source input image up.
member.remarks: If the property value for 0.5 seconds, then the detail enhancement will auto-adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.
Another way to adjust the detail enhancement is via the .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.DetailEnhancementDown
member.summary: Property to adjust the amount of detail enhancement to apply to the video source input image down.
member.remarks: If the property value for 0.5 seconds, then the detail enhancement will auto-adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.
Another way to adjust the detail enhancement is via the .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.NoiseThresholdUp
member.summary: Property to adjust the noise threshold up by one step.
member.remarks: If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the noise threshold will auto-adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.
Another way to adjust the noise threshold is via the .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.NoiseThresholdDown
member.summary: Property to adjust the noise threshold down by one step.
member.remarks: If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the noise threshold will auto-adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.
Another way to adjust the noise threshold is via the .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.NoiseReductionUp
member.summary: Property to adjust the amount of noise reduction to apply to the video source input image up by one step.
member.remarks: If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the noise reduction will auto-adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.
Another way to adjust the noise reduction is via the .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.NoiseReductionDown
member.summary: Property to adjust the amount of noise reduction to apply to the video source input image down by one step.
member.remarks: If the property value is true for 0.5 seconds, then the noise reduction will auto-adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.
Another way to adjust the noise reduction is via the .

member.summary: Property to set the black bar ratio.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdSourceControlReservedSigs.SourceTypeFeedback
member.summary:
Property to indicate both the video source type and video card.
The event will trigger with and .
member.remarks: The basic values for the source types located in and board offsets are located in .
For example, a value of 1 signifies RGB on Board 1. A value of 11 signifies RGB on Board 2; a value of 21 is RGB on Board 3, etc. The offsets specify the board number.
Video Type is formed by adding the value to value.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.PeakUp
member.summary: Property to raise the peak by 1%.
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the peak will continue to adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the peak reaches 100%.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.PeakDown
member.summary: Property to lower the peak by 1%.
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the peak will continue to adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the peak reaches 0%.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.BoostUp
member.summary: Property to raise the boost by 1%.
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the boost will continue to adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the boost reaches 100%.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.BoostDown
member.summary: Property to lower the boost by 1%.
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the boost will continue to adjust in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the boost reaches 0%.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.RedSkewUp
member.summary: Property to increase the skew of the red twisted pair at by 1 nanosecond (1 = 1ns).
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the skew will continue to adjust up in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the skew reaches 15.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.RedSkewDown
member.summary: Property to decrease the skew of the red twisted pair by 1 nanosecond (1 = 1ns).
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the skew will continue to adjust down in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the skew reaches 0.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.GreenSkewUp
member.summary: Property to increase the skew of the green twisted pair at by 1 nanosecond (1 = 1ns).
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the skew will continue to adjust up in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the skew reaches 15.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.GreenSkewDown
member.summary: Property to decrease the skew of the green twisted pair by 1 nanosecond (1 = 1ns).
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the skew will continue to adjust down in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the skew reaches 0.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.BlueSkewUp
member.summary: Property to increase the skew of the blue twisted pair at by 1 nanosecond (1 = 1ns).
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the skew will continue to adjust up in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the skew reaches 15.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.BlueSkewDown
member.summary: Property to decrease the skew of the blue twisted pair by 1 nanosecond (1 = 1ns).
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the skew will continue to adjust down in one-step increments every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the skew reaches 0.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.CompensationPresetUp
member.summary: Property to adjust the compensation preset number up.
member.remarks: Minimum preset number = 1, Maximum preset number = 99
If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the preset number will auto-adjust every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.DVPHD.DvphdQmSourceCompensationReservedSigs.CompensationPresetDown
member.summary: Property to adjust the compensation preset number down.
member.remarks: If the property value remains true for 0.5 seconds, then the preset number will auto-adjust every 25ms until the property value becomes false or until the limit is reached.

member.summary: Property to raise the speaker volume by 1% if input is true. This property has no effect once the volume reaches 100%. If the property remains true the volume will auto-increment until the property is set to false or until the maximum volume is reached.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Dge100AudioReservedSigs.AllAudioVolumeDown
member.summary: Property to lower the speaker volume by 1%. This property has no effect once the volume reaches 0%. If the property remains true the volume will auto-decrement until the property is set to false or until the volume reaches 0%.

member.summary: Property to lower the key click volume by 1%. This property has no effect once the volume reaches 0%. If the property remains true the volume will auto-decrement until the property is set to false or until the volume reaches 0%.

member.summary: Method to set the LCD backlight brightness level to High.

member.summary: Method to set the LCD backlight brightness level to Medium.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessLow
member.summary: Method to set the LCD backlight brightness level to Low.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessAutomaticOn
member.summary:
Turns on auto-mode for LCD backlight brightness control on the rising edge of the input.
This signifies that the LCD backlight brightness will be set to high when the light sensor detects that the current brightness level (reported by ) exceeds the level specified by .
Similarly, the LCD brightness will be set to low when the light sensor detects that the current brightness level is below .

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessAutomaticOff
member.summary: Method to turn off auto mode for LCD backlight brightness control.

member.summary: Method to initialize the sigs of the System extender

member.summary: Property to indicate that the LCD backlight brightness is at High.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessMediumFeedback
member.summary: Property to indicate that the LCD backlight brightness is at Medium.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessLowFeedback
member.summary: Property to indicate that the LCD backlight brightness is at Low.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessAutomaticOnFeedback
member.summary: Property to indicate that auto mode for LCD backlight brightness is turned on.The output remains true for as long as auto-mode is enabled.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessAutomaticOffFeedback
member.summary: Property to indicate that auto mode for LCD backlight brightness is turned off. The output remains true for as long as auto-mode is disabled.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessAutomaticThresholdUp
member.summary:
Raises the LCD backlight brightness threshold (reported by ) by 1.
If the input remains true for 0.5 seconds, the threshold will increment every 25ms until the input goes false or until it reaches the maximum value of 100.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessAutomaticThresholdDown
member.summary:
Lowers the LCD backlight brightness threshold (reported by ) by 1.
If the input remains true for 0.5 seconds, the threshold will increment every 25ms until the input goes false or until it reaches the maximum value of 100.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LightSensorValueFeedback
member.summary: Reports the ambient brightness level detected by the light sensor, from 0 to 100. This value is used to adjust the LCD backlight brightness in auto-mode.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessAutoThreshold
member.summary: Property to set the threshold level that is used in auto-mode for LCD backlight brightness control.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.UI.Tpmc9lSystemReservedSigs.LcdBrightnessAutoThresholdFeedback
member.summary: Property to report the LCD backlight threshold.
